The enumerable to be partitioned.

summary.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A ordem usada no particionador criado é determinada pela ordem natural dos elementos, conforme recuperados da fonte de enumerável.The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable. Para obter mais informações e exemplos, consulte [Particionadores personalizados para PLINQ e TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).
